ARABIC: يَٰقَوْمِ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْأَرْضَ ٱلْمُقَدَّسَةَ ٱلَّتِى كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ وَلَا تَرْتَدُّوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَدْبَارِكُمْ فَتَنقَلِبُوا۟ خَٰسِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'My people! enter the Holy Land which Allah has ordained for you Do not turn back in your tracks and so become transformed into losers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Enter then, my people, the Holy Land that God has ordained for you, and do not turn back, or you will suffer."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: My people! Enter the holy land which Allah has ordained for you; and do not turn back for then you will turn about losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Enter the sacred promised land which God has designated for you. Do not return to disbelief lest you become lost".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “O my people! Enter the holy land which Allah has decreed for you and do not turn back, for you will turn back as losers.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O my people! Enter the Holy Land which Allah has assigned to you and turn not back; for then you will be returned as losers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O my people! enter the holy land which Allah has prescribed for you and turn not on your backs for then you will turn back losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O my people, enter the Holy Land which God has prescribed for you, and turn not back in your traces, to turn about losers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O my people! Go into the holy land which Allah hath ordained for you. Turn not in flight, for surely ye turn back as losers:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: O my people! Enter the holy land which God has assigned  for you. Do not turn back, or you will be the losers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O my people! enter the holy land which Allah hath prescribed for you and turn not back to your rearward for then ye become losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O my people, enter the Holy Land which Allah has ordained for you, and do not turn your backs, or you will become losers.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O my people! Enter the holy land which Allah hath assigned unto you, and turn not back ignominiously, for then will ye be overthrown, to your own ruin."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O my people! Enter the holy land (Palestine) which Allah has assigned to you, and turn not back (in flight) for then you will be returned as losers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Enter, my people, the Holy Land which Allah has written for you. Do not turn back in your footsteps, lest you shall turn to be losers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “O my people, enter the Holy Land which God has assigned for you, and do not turn back, lest you return as losers.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O my people, enter the Holy Land which Allah has assigned to you and do not turn back [from fighting in Allah 's cause] and [thus] become losers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [5:21]   O my people, enter the Holy, the purified, Land which God has ordained for you, [which] He commanded you to enter, and this is Syria (al-shām), and do not turn back in flight, [do not] retreat in fear of the enemy, or you will end up as losers’, in your efforts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 my people! Go into the holy land) the purified Damascus, Palestine and parts of Jordan (which Allah hath 114 ordained for you) which Allah has gifted to you and made it a bequest of your father Abraham. (Turn not in flight) retreating, (for surely ye turn back as losers) who are punished: Allah will take away from you the quails and honey:
